sanwedi roga ithihasaya kathawakata peralimatamema kathawa liyu, kothalawala aarashaka wishwawidyalaye waidya shishya, ma mithuru chandimata awasara ha athahitha dun, hithamithuru kothalawala aarashaka wishwawidyalaye waidya shishya dulan hata karthru chandimageth mageth wishesha sthuthiya (owun dedenage awasarayakin thorawa uputa ganimen walakinna).
futa aragalaye idiripela kriyakarin bohomayak siya jiwana bhawithayenma me wikalpa jiwana wilasaya prawardhanaya karannan bawa mage nirikshanayayi.
